overview:
Matt Arney leads CSOFTâ€™s North America sales team and is accountable for driving revenue and managing customer relationships throughout the region. He joined CSOFT in 2004 after working more than 8 years in the Japanese software distribution industry.

Most recently, Arney was Vice President of Business Development at Act2 Inc., one of Japan’s leading software distribution companies that he co-founded. In this role, he grew the companyâ€™s annual revenues from zero to $10 million dollars. Earlier, Arney drove Japan sales for Seiwa Systems as well as managed the localization of software titles. Arney holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from San Diego State University and fluent in Japanese.
